desc.en: Sensei sets aside his backlog of work to take a walk downtown and runs into Akane. Akane is wearing an eye-catching bunny girl outfit, and a speechless Sensei urgently leaves the area with Akane in tow. To Sensei's shock, they end up taking refuge in a bunny girl cafe.
desc.jp: Sensei sets aside his backlog of work to take a walk downtown and runs into Akane. Akane is wearing an eye-catching bunny girl outfit, and a speechless Sensei urgently leaves the area with Akane in tow. To Sensei's shock, they end up taking refuge in a bunny girl cafe.
desc.zh_cn: 在市区散步时巧遇了穿着兔女郎服装的{cf朱音}。据本人所说，她一直在这里等着老师。为了躲避周围的视线而逃进的咖啡厅竟然是兔女郎主题的咖啡厅，{cf朱音}对老师的造诣之深相当感动。

desc.en: Ako calls Sensei regarding an urgent matter. Sensei comforts Ako as she vents about all of the terrible things that have been happening to her. When Sensei finally asks what the urgent matter is, Ako says it was everything she had been talking about and leaves smiling.
desc.jp: Ako calls Sensei regarding an urgent matter. Sensei comforts Ako as she vents about all of the terrible things that have been happening to her. When Sensei finally asks what the urgent matter is, Ako says it was everything she had been talking about and leaves smiling.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚子}以自己有急事为由，把老师约了出来。两人见到面后，{cf亚子}便开始向老师抱怨自己今天一整天遇到了很多坏事，于是老师安抚她的情绪。等到{cf亚子}的心情终于平复下来后，老师便开口问{cf亚子}有什么急事要找自己，没想到{cf亚子}却回答他说自己刚才讲的那些事就是所谓的急事，并且笑瞇瞇地转身扬长而去。

举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Ako blames Sensei for her stress. Sensei protests against this accusation, but Ako proposes a bet to figure out who's right. Sensei wins the bet, and according to the rules, Ako must humiliate herself by pretending to act like a dog before Sensei.
desc.jp: Ako blames Sensei for her stress. Sensei protests against this accusation, but Ako proposes a bet to figure out who's right. Sensei wins the bet, and according to the rules, Ako must humiliate herself by pretending to act like a dog before Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: {cf亚子}认为老师是害她最近压力不停增加的元凶，老师认为{cf亚子}是在耍赖进行了反驳，并提议要以打赌来决定谁说的话才是对的。两人以输家要戴颈链为赌注进行了打赌，最终老师获胜，{cf亚子}戴上了颈链作为赌输的代价。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.zh_cn: 收到状态有点奇怪的{cf明日奈}传来的MomoTalk后，因为担心便去找她的老师在公园找到了呆滞的{cf明日奈}。据本人所说，闲下来太久后集中力有时会变得迟钝。在勉强将连怎么走路都忘记的{cf明日奈}带回宿舍的途中，因为在楼梯上踩空而跌了下来──在老师成了{cf明日奈}的肉垫后，她顺利回到了以往的状态。

desc.en: Chihiro takes on a security check request from a boorish boss and discovers suspicious data on their servers. Chihiro is torn between her duty as security manager versus her conscious but decides to blow the whistle on the shady businessperson.
desc.jp: Chihiro takes on a security check request from a boorish boss and discovers suspicious data on their servers. Chihiro is torn between her duty as security manager versus her conscious but decides to blow the whistle on the shady businessperson.
desc.zh_cn: {cf千寻}从一位没礼貌的大老板手中，接下了一项网络安全维护委托。在进行维护的过程中，{cf千寻}在服务器中发现了一份来源不明的数据数据。起初在保密义务和良心之间左右为难的{cf千寻}，最终还是决定揭发委托人的不法行为。

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Haruka sends a worrying MomoTalk message, and Sensei rushes to find her. It turns out to be a misunderstanding, and Haruka actually ends up having to rescue Sensei after getting lost.
desc.jp: Haruka sends a worrying MomoTalk message, and Sensei rushes to find her. It turns out to be a misunderstanding, and Haruka actually ends up having to rescue Sensei after getting lost.
desc.zh_cn: 收到{cf遥香}传来的一封令人担{cf忧}的MomoTalk消息后，老师急匆匆地出门寻找{cf遥香}。然而在{cf遥香}反过来救了迷路的老师后，他们才发现这一切只是场误会。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.

desc.en: Haruna conducts gastronomic research in Gehenna Academy's closed-down dining hall. She makes the explosive mistake of substituting ethanol for alcohol, and her research ends in failure.
desc.jp: Haruna conducts gastronomic research in Gehenna Academy's closed-down dining hall. She makes the explosive mistake of substituting ethanol for alcohol, and her research ends in failure.
desc.zh_cn: 在{sn格黑娜}学园的被封锁的餐厅进行美食研究的{cf羽留奈}。{cf羽留奈}以酒精来代替酒，结果引发爆炸，导致研究以失败告终。

desc.en: Haruna asks Sensei to meet her for the ultimate gourmet meal. She explains that gastronomy isn't defined solely by the food. Haruna partakes in a meal with Sensei involving all the elements of gastronomy that she believes are important.

desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.zh_cn: 虽然{cf伊吕波}不惜翘课去煽动老师，但是面对毫不动摇的老师，{cf伊吕波}最终只好放弃，并提议一起去吃饭。在老师接受这个提议的瞬间，{cf伊吕波}便微笑着说：「成功煽动老师了。」

desc.en: Sensei notices that Izuna is avoiding swimming and asks why. Izuna replies that she's afraid her lord will be disappointed that she can't swim, despite being a ninja. Sensei says she doesn't have to feel that way and teaches Izuna how to swim.
desc.jp: Sensei notices that Izuna is avoiding swimming and asks why. Izuna replies that she's afraid her lord will be disappointed that she can't swim, despite being a ninja. Sensei says she doesn't have to feel that way and teaches Izuna how to swim.
desc.zh_cn: 老师知道{cf伊树菜}在躲避游泳这件事，便询问她躲避的理由。{cf伊树菜}回答说怕自己是不会游泳的忍者这件事，主公知道后会失望才会那样做，老师则说不会有那种事，并和{cf伊树菜}一起练习游泳。

desc.en: Junko's eating plans get canceled. To avoid her having to skip a meal, Sensei gives Junko an instant ramen cup. Despite her initial dismissiveness, the cup ramen is a revelatory experience for her.
desc.jp: Junko's eating plans get canceled. To avoid her having to skip a meal, Sensei gives Junko an instant ramen cup. Despite her initial dismissiveness, the cup ramen is a revelatory experience for her.
desc.zh_cn: 由于难得的美食计划被取消，使得{cf淳子}没饭吃。因此老师为{cf淳子}递上即时拉面。{cf淳子}原本很不喜欢即时拉面，结果尝了一口味道就深深爱上它了。

desc.en: Sensei meets Kaho, who is finishing some work in the Yin-Yang Club's club room. Just as Kaho is about to leave to show Sensei around Hyakkiyako Academy, the students of Hyakkiyako Academy begin to arrive. It's evening when they finish helping the Hyakkiyako Academy students with their business, and so they decide that the tour will have to wait until next time.
desc.jp: Sensei meets Kaho, who is finishing some work in the Yin-Yang Club's club room. Just as Kaho is about to leave to show Sensei around Hyakkiyako Academy, the students of Hyakkiyako Academy begin to arrive. It's evening when they finish helping the Hyakkiyako Academy students with their business, and so they decide that the tour will have to wait until next time.
desc.zh_cn: 老师在{cn阴阳部}社办见到了正在整理工作的{cf佳穗}。{cf佳穗}准备向老师介绍{sn百鬼夜行}学园的瞬间，{sn百鬼夜行}的学生们突然闯进来了。解决完{sn百鬼夜行}学生的事情已经是晚上，结果老师的伴游就延到下次了。

desc.en: Sensei invites Kasumi to Schale. Kasumi brings various books on civil engineering, geology, and architectural engineering and begins to study. Sensei tells her that she can visit anytime she wants, and they spend some time chatting.
desc.jp: Sensei invites Kasumi to Schale. Kasumi brings various books on civil engineering, geology, and architectural engineering and begins to study. Sensei tells her that she can visit anytime she wants, and they spend some time chatting.
desc.zh_cn: 老师请佳澄到{et夏莱}一趟。佳澄带来了各种与土木、地质学、建筑工学有关的书籍，开始钻研。老师告诉佳澄，只要想来的话随时欢迎，两人一边闲聊一边打发时间。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 便利屋の事務所に到着した先生を迎えるカヨコ。先生は事務所の片隅に放置されたドレスを見かける。少しの会話を交わした後、先生はカヨコに一緒に夕食を食べることを提案するのであった。

desc.en: Sensei has been busy since the beginning of the New Year. Kayoko suggests going to see a wagakki concert to help him relax. Sensei expects a peaceful performance, but instead, Kayoko introduces him to an intense, heavy metal-tinged wagakki performance.
desc.jp: Sensei has been busy since the beginning of the New Year. Kayoko suggests going to see a wagakki concert to help him relax. Sensei expects a peaceful performance, but instead, Kayoko introduces him to an intense, heavy metal-tinged wagakki performance.
desc.zh_cn: 从新年初就开始忙碌的老师。为了安抚身心疲惫的老师，{cf佳世子}提议一起去听{cl和乐}器的表演。虽然老师很期待平静的{cl和乐}器表演，但{cf佳世子}介绍的表演却是重金属音乐风的{cl和乐}器表演。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: キキョウに呼び出され百花繚乱を訪れた先生は、建物の老朽化に気づく。気にすることないと話すキキョウだが、先生は危ないから修理する、と自ら修理用具で補修を始め――その姿に、最初は手を貸さないと告げていたキキョウも手を貸してくれる。そして、キキョウはお礼として先生に夕食をごちそうするのだった。
desc.jp: キキョウに呼び出され百花繚乱を訪れた先生は、建物の老朽化に気づく。気にすることないと話すキキョウだが、先生は危ないから修理する、と自ら修理用具で補修を始め――その姿に、最初は手を貸さないと告げていたキキョウも手を貸してくれる。そして、キキョウはお礼として先生に夕食をごちそうするのだった。
desc.zh_cn: {cfキキョウ}に呼び出され百花缭乱を访れた先生は、建物の老朽化に気づく。気にすることないと话す{cfキキョウ}だが、先生は危ないから修理する、と自ら修理用具で补修を始め――その姿に、最初は手を贷さないと告げていた{cfキキョウ}も手を贷してくれる。そして、{cfキキョウ}はお礼として先生に夕食をごちそうするのだった。

desc.en: Sensei arrives at the beach to find Koharu on a rock, staring out at the horizon. After some time, Koharu and Sensei try to return to the island but panic when the tide starts to come in. Koharu clings to Sensei's back as they make their way off the beach.

desc.zh_cn: 老师来到海边，发现凝视着海平面的{cf小春}。过了一段时间，{cf小春}和老师正想回到岛上，却发现潮水已经上涌，两人不知所措。老师将{cf小春}背在背上，离开了海边。

desc.en: Kotama wiretaps Schale in a vain attempt to discover Sensei's secrets. When confronted, Kotama admits she just wanted to get closer to Sensei, so Sensei reveals a personal weakness.
desc.jp: Kotama wiretaps Schale in a vain attempt to discover Sensei's secrets. When confronted, Kotama admits she just wanted to get closer to Sensei, so Sensei reveals a personal weakness.
desc.zh_cn: {cf小玉}为了查出老师的秘密，试图用尽各种方法在{et夏莱}安装窃听器，但却失败连连。当老师问说为什么想查自己的秘密，{cf小玉}便说出真心话，说是想和老师更亲近。于是老师便老实地把自己的弱点告诉{cf小玉}。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.zh_cn: 等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Mari falls ill after neglecting to take care of herself. Sensei chastises her, telling her that she must care for herself as she cares for others, which helps put Mari at ease.
desc.jp: Mari falls ill after neglecting to take care of herself. Sensei chastises her, telling her that she must care for herself as she cares for others, which helps put Mari at ease.
desc.zh_cn: 总是疏于照顾自己的{cf玛丽}得了感冒。而老师也借此机会教育她不要只顾着关心他人，却不把自己的身体当回事。老师说的话莫名令{cf玛丽}感到相当安心。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Marina is accused of being a fraud at a security post on the outskirts of Red Winter by a member who doesn't recognize her. She is released thanks to Sensei's help, but becomes rather deflated for a while.
desc.jp: Marina is accused of being a fraud at a security post on the outskirts of Red Winter by a member who doesn't recognize her. She is released thanks to Sensei's help, but becomes rather deflated for a while.
desc.zh_cn: 在{sn赤冬}外围的保安哨所中，{cf玛丽娜}被不认识自己的保安委员当成是冒充委员长的犯人而被抓。虽然得到老师的帮助后马上被释放，但{cf玛丽娜}却消沈了一阵子。

desc.zh_cn: 收到{cf弥香}的联系后，老师匆匆忙忙前往{sn三一}，他发现{cf弥香}手上拿着被{sn其他}学生欺负时弄破的泳装。安慰哭泣的{cf弥香}，老师说要亲自教{cf弥香}游泳。

desc.en: Sensei follows Misaki up to the rooftop of a high-rise, who is precariously balanced on a ledge. Misaki seems to ignore Sensei's concerns, but she eventually takes an elevator back down with them. On the way, however, it suddenly breaks down and Misaki panics because she has claustrophobia.
desc.jp: Sensei follows Misaki up to the rooftop of a high-rise, who is precariously balanced on a ledge. Misaki seems to ignore Sensei's concerns, but she eventually takes an elevator back down with them. On the way, however, it suddenly breaks down and Misaki panics because she has claustrophobia.
desc.zh_cn: 追着看起来有些危险的{cf美咲}，来到高楼大厦顶楼的老师。但是{cf美咲}对老师的关心没有做出特别的反应，两人搭着电梯回到地面。但是在下来的途中，电梯突然停了下来。在故障的电梯里，{cf美咲}因为有幽闭恐惧症而感到惊慌失措。

desc.en: 美咲聯絡上老師，似乎是有什麼事。然而美咲避而不談，匆匆找了個藉口推辭後就不再說了。
desc.jp: 美咲聯絡上老師，似乎是有什麼事。然而美咲避而不談，匆匆找了個藉口推辭後就不再說了。
desc.zh_cn: {cf美咲}联系上老师，似乎是有什么事。然而{cf美咲}避而不谈，匆匆找了个借口推辞后就不再说了。

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.jp: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: 老師在建築外遇到了美咲，但美咲對老師的好意並不領情，還懷疑地詢問老師此行的目的。老師表示自己放心不下美咲，因此過來看看她。美咲表示因為自己要保護大家，所以不能與外人聯絡。儘管如此，美咲還是要老師幫一個忙，老師欣然接受。
desc.jp: 老師在建築外遇到了美咲，但美咲對老師的好意並不領情，還懷疑地詢問老師此行的目的。老師表示自己放心不下美咲，因此過來看看她。美咲表示因為自己要保護大家，所以不能與外人聯絡。儘管如此，美咲還是要老師幫一個忙，老師欣然接受。
desc.zh_cn: 老师在建筑外遇到了{cf美咲}，但{cf美咲}对老师的好意并不领情，还怀疑地询问老师此行的目的。老师表示自己放心不下{cf美咲}，因此过来看看她。{cf美咲}表示因为自己要保护大家，所以不能与外人联络。尽管如此，{cf美咲}还是要老师帮一个忙，老师欣然接受。

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.jp: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: 美咲在老師的幫助下來到了大廈頂樓，在那她完成了對GPS定位誤差的修正工作。結束之後，美咲沒說什麼就打算下樓。
desc.jp: 美咲在老師的幫助下來到了大廈頂樓，在那她完成了對GPS定位誤差的修正工作。結束之後，美咲沒說什麼就打算下樓。
desc.zh_cn: {cf美咲}在老师的帮助下来到了大厦顶楼，在那她完成了对GPS定位误差的修正工作。结束之后，{cf美咲}没说什么就打算下楼。

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.jp: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: 電梯裡，美咲似乎不是很有精神。她首先自覺是不是自己讓老師感覺不好，然後又表達了對進食的無感——反正，肉體只是一個沒有意義的容器，因為它終將回歸塵土。老師詢問美咲有沒有什麼自覺重要的東西。
desc.jp: 電梯裡，美咲似乎不是很有精神。她首先自覺是不是自己讓老師感覺不好，然後又表達了對進食的無感——反正，肉體只是一個沒有意義的容器，因為它終將回歸塵土。老師詢問美咲有沒有什麼自覺重要的東西。
desc.zh_cn: 电梯里，{cf美咲}似乎不是很有精神。她首先自觉是不是自己让老师感觉不好，然后又表达了对进食的无感——反正，肉体只是一个没有意义的容器，因为它终将回归尘土。老师询问{cf美咲}有没有什么自觉重要的东西。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.

desc.en: 就在老師和美咲談論時，電梯突然出現故障，停了，裡面一片漆黑。電梯內隨後廣播，因其防災系統發生錯誤，大樓已全部停電，預計修復時間為一小時左右。
desc.jp: 就在老師和美咲談論時，電梯突然出現故障，停了，裡面一片漆黑。電梯內隨後廣播，因其防災系統發生錯誤，大樓已全部停電，預計修復時間為一小時左右。
desc.zh_cn: 就在老师和{cf美咲}谈论时，电梯突然出现故障，停了，里面一片漆黑。电梯内随后广播，因其防灾系统发生错误，大楼已全部停电，预计修复时间为一小时左右。

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.jp: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: 美咲聽到廣播後突然慌亂起來，她讓老師不要再和她講話，臉色似乎也很差。老師一再追問下，美咲不得不說出自己有幽閉恐懼症的缺點。
desc.jp: 美咲聽到廣播後突然慌亂起來，她讓老師不要再和她講話，臉色似乎也很差。老師一再追問下，美咲不得不說出自己有幽閉恐懼症的缺點。
desc.zh_cn: {cf美咲}听到广播后突然慌乱起来，她让老师不要再和她讲话，脸色似乎也很差。老师一再追问下，{cf美咲}不得不说出自己有幽闭恐惧症的缺点。

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.jp: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: 因為過度恐慌，美咲險些暈倒在地。就在這時電源恢復，大門也開了，美咲立刻跑了出去。
desc.jp: 因為過度恐慌，美咲險些暈倒在地。就在這時電源恢復，大門也開了，美咲立刻跑了出去。
desc.zh_cn: 因为过度恐慌，{cf美咲}险些晕倒在地。就在这时电源恢复，大门也开了，{cf美咲}立刻跑了出去。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.

desc.en: Miyu and Sensei visit the downtown shopping district to buy camping gear. Due to her lack of presence, Miyu is ignored by people. It makes her sad that her lack of presence never has an advantage, but she is able to successfully pet a ferocious yet adorable cat thanks to it.
desc.jp: Miyu and Sensei visit the downtown shopping district to buy camping gear. Due to her lack of presence, Miyu is ignored by people. It makes her sad that her lack of presence never has an advantage, but she is able to successfully pet a ferocious yet adorable cat thanks to it.
desc.zh_cn: 为了购买露营用品而访问市区商店的{cf美优}和老师。但是{cf美优}因为没有存在感的体质，一直被市民们无视，还经历一些令人头大的事。{cf美优}说自己的存在感很低，所以没有因为这点得到什么好处而感到忧郁，但是多亏那种体质，才得以成功抚摸到可爱却凶恶的猫咪。

desc.en: One sweltering day, Saki refuses to take her helmet off while on duty, and Sensei makes several attempts to get it off. Just as Sensei is about to give up... work hours end and Saki voluntarily takes off her helmet.
desc.jp: One sweltering day, Saki refuses to take her helmet off while on duty, and Sensei makes several attempts to get it off. Just as Sensei is about to give up... work hours end and Saki voluntarily takes off her helmet.
desc.zh_cn: 在某个炎热的日子，面对就算在值日生活动时也固执地不愿脱掉钢盔的{cf咲希}，老师为了让他脱去钢盔，进行了各种尝试。但是不管再怎么威逼利诱，{cf咲希}都不愿脱去钢盔………但是{cf咲希}在工作一结束后，就自然而然脱下钢盔，让老师做的那些尝试黯然失色。

hobby.jp: 銃器の整備、植物などの採集

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: One day, Saya's pet rat, Nezusuke, goes missing from her lab. Saya blames herself for playing too many pranks, but it turns out the rat was just out getting sunflower seeds from the Promenade. The pair reaffrim their friendship during a heartfelt reunion.
desc.jp: One day, Saya's pet rat, Nezusuke, goes missing from her lab. Saya blames herself for playing too many pranks, but it turns out the rat was just out getting sunflower seeds from the Promenade. The pair reaffrim their friendship during a heartfelt reunion.
desc.zh_cn: 有一天，{cf沙耶}的宠物鼠，根津助突然从{cf沙耶}的实验室消失踪影。{cf沙耶}很自责，以为是因为自己平常欺负牠，所以牠才离家出走。但其实牠只是去领商会分发的葵花籽。他们俩再次体认到彼此的友情，感动地再次重逢。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: The marathon of part-time jobs takes its toll on Serika and she collapses from overwork. Sensei takes off work to nurse her back to health. Afterward, on the swings in the park, Serika opens up about the feelings she's bottling up.
desc.jp: The marathon of part-time jobs takes its toll on Serika and she collapses from overwork. Sensei takes off work to nurse her back to health. Afterward, on the swings in the park, Serika opens up about the feelings she's bottling up.
desc.zh_cn: {cf茜香}因为连续打工而过劳晕倒，于是老师马上取消打工照料{cf茜香}。{cf茜香}坐在公园的秋千上，倾吐这段时间藏在心里的内心话。

desc.en: Serika begins her part-time miko job but is dismayed when she feels things aren't going well. However, after receiving Sensei's encouragement, Serika becomes the most prominent part-time miko at the event.
desc.jp: Serika begins her part-time miko job but is dismayed when she feels things aren't going well. However, after receiving Sensei's encouragement, Serika becomes the most prominent part-time miko at the event.
desc.zh_cn: 正式成为巫女工读生后，工作上遇到的不顺很快便让{cf茜香}变得闷闷不乐。幸好有老师的鼓励，{cf茜香}很快便重新振作起来，并且成为活动会场上最受瞩目的工读生。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.jp: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Sensei runs into Serina, who is giving out gifts to children in celebration of the Holy Night. Snow starts to fall and the night grows colder, so Sensei gives Serina a gift of her own.
desc.jp: Sensei runs into Serina, who is giving out gifts to children in celebration of the Holy Night. Snow starts to fall and the night grows colder, so Sensei gives Serina a gift of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 老师遇见了在平安夜分发礼物给孩子们的{cf芹奈}。不知不觉下起雪来了，老师送围巾给怕冷的{cf芹奈}。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.

desc.en: Sensei tags along on Serina's one-day Remedial Knights experience. Dressed in a Santa outfit for Christmas, Serina makes rounds through the hospital rooms while skillfully interacting with patients. When the day is done, Serina wants to know why Sensei decided to shadow her for the day, and Sensei answers that it was because of their interest in Serina and the Remedial Knights.
desc.jp: Sensei tags along on Serina's one-day Remedial Knights experience. Dressed in a Santa outfit for Christmas, Serina makes rounds through the hospital rooms while skillfully interacting with patients. When the day is done, Serina wants to know why Sensei decided to shadow her for the day, and Sensei answers that it was because of their interest in Serina and the Remedial Knights.
desc.zh_cn: 老师一起参加了{cf芹奈}的{cn救护骑士团}一日体验。为了迎接圣诞节而穿上圣诞服的{cf芹奈}正在巡房，并且熟练地应对病患。工作结束后，{cf芹奈}询问老师参加{cn救护骑士团}的理由，老师表示自己对{cf芹奈}和{cn救护骑士团}都很感兴趣。

desc.en: At Red Winter Academy, Sensei gets stranded while traversing the snowy mountains. Thankfully, Sensei is rescued by Shigure who happens to be passing through the area, and she thoroughly scolds Sensei for not listening to her advice. Afterwards, Sensei is safely brought back to Schale by Shigure on piggyback.
desc.jp: At Red Winter Academy, Sensei gets stranded while traversing the snowy mountains. Thankfully, Sensei is rescued by Shigure who happens to be passing through the area, and she thoroughly scolds Sensei for not listening to her advice. Afterwards, Sensei is safely brought back to Schale by Shigure on piggyback.
desc.zh_cn: 造访{sn赤冬}联邦学园的老师在攀爬雪山时遇难了。但幸亏经过附近的{cf时雨}救了老师，{cf时雨}责备老师没有听自己先前的建议。后来{cf时雨}揹着老师顺利回到了{et夏莱}。

desc.en: Shimiko comes across a disorganized pile of unidentified and neglected books. She excitedly searches in the hopes of finding a never-before-seen book, but what she finds instead defies her expectations.
desc.jp: Shimiko comes across a disorganized pile of unidentified and neglected books. She excitedly searches in the hopes of finding a never-before-seen book, but what she finds instead defies her expectations.
desc.zh_cn: 尚未整理，一直被搁置的来历不明的书。{cf志美子}说不定很期待能发现至今不曾看过的新书。然而在短暂的旅程结束后，{cf志美子}所找到的是完全不同的东西。

desc.en: Sensei runs into Shiroko in a subway station far from Abydos. Shiroko tells Sensei she's planning a long-distance cycling trip.

desc.zh_cn: 老师在离{sn阿拜多斯}有一段距离的地铁站遇到{cf白子}。{cf白子}告诉老师自己在计划长距离骑行。

desc.en: Shizuko tries to show off to [USERNAME] Sensei by dressing up like a pop idol. She's discouraged by Sensei's lukewarm response, but soon perks back up when Sensei says that she's best just the way she normally is.

desc.en: Suzumi voluntarily keeps Trinity safe as a member of the Vigilante Crew. The flash grenade in her grip is just another example of her kindness and goodwill.

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Ui, wanting to talk more with Sensei, requests for them to become pen pals. However, the note that Ui wanted to use was too big and blocky, so Sensei suggests using the library's visitor log to communicate.

desc.en: Sensei is late to a meet-up with Wakamo due to work, and Wakamo becomes confused by the apology. Wakamo declares she'd gladly wait for hours, days, or even months. Sensei becomes nervous.
desc.jp: Sensei is late to a meet-up with Wakamo due to work, and Wakamo becomes confused by the apology. Wakamo declares she'd gladly wait for hours, days, or even months. Sensei becomes nervous.
desc.zh_cn: 因为一时忙昏头，老师不小心忘记了和{cf若藻}的约定。虽然老师事后一直向{cf若藻}道歉，但{cf若藻}反而对老师的举动感到相当不解。{cf若藻}表示只要老师绝对不会背叛自己，无论要她等几个小时、几天、几个月都无所谓，然而听完她的话后，老师的额头却不禁冒了几滴冷汗。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

name.en: Something to Hide, Something to Reveal
name.jp: Something to Hide, Something to Reveal

desc.en: Sensei goes along with Wakamo's plans to make summer memories, but constantly has to leave because of work for Schale. Wakamo is offended that her date was interrupted and starts to rampage...
desc.jp: Sensei goes along with Wakamo's plans to make summer memories, but constantly has to leave because of work for Schale. Wakamo is offended that her date was interrupted and starts to rampage...
desc.zh_cn: 「完美的夏日回忆」计划没有结束。认为老师心里还有想做的事的{cf若藻}，和老师做了「约会」的约定。然而，每次约会时老师都会被烟火大会准备的问题叫回去……。持续被打扰约会的{cf若藻}终于，认为如果没有把老师叫走好几次烟火大会的存在就好，下定决定引爆仓库。面对在仓库胡闹的{cf若藻}，老师强烈的斥责了。

desc.en: Sensei offers Yuzu a part-time job wearing a mascot costume, and she starts working at the theme park. Yuzu feels fulfilled when she manages to make some children happy.
desc.jp: Sensei offers Yuzu a part-time job wearing a mascot costume, and she starts working at the theme park. Yuzu feels fulfilled when she manages to make some children happy.
desc.zh_cn: 接受老师的建议，接下人偶服打工而到游乐园工作的{cf柚子}。{cf柚子}看到小朋友们因为自己的行动而开心，再次感受到成就感。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Sensei is working away in Schale when Yuzu runs in, looking upset. She ran away from the part-time job Sensei helped her get when she realized it was at a maid cafe. To help Yuzu find the courage to face her job, Sensei offers to give her maid lessons.
desc.jp: Sensei is working away in Schale when Yuzu runs in, looking upset. She ran away from the part-time job Sensei helped her get when she realized it was at a maid cafe. To help Yuzu find the courage to face her job, Sensei offers to give her maid lessons.
desc.zh_cn: 在{et夏莱}从容办公的老师。过了一会儿，传来了急促的脚步声，{cf柚子}哭丧着表情来到了{et夏莱}。听过原委后，她明白老师安排的打工是女仆咖啡厅，接着便逃离了咖啡厅。老师为了让{cf柚子}能适应打工环境，于是提议进行女仆特训。

desc.en: Sensei sees Problem Solver out of Abydos. In the mean time, Ayane and Serika pay Master Shiba a visit in the hospital. He tells the girls that the ramen shop's building has been taken over by the Kaiser Corporation.
desc.jp: Sensei sees Problem Solver out of Abydos. In the mean time, Ayane and Serika pay Master Shiba a visit in the hospital. He tells the girls that the ramen shop's building has been taken over by the Kaiser Corporation.
desc.zh_cn: 老师为前往{sn阿拜多斯}的便利屋送行。另一方面，{cf绫音}和{cf茜香}一同去找住院的柴关老板，从老板口中得知拉面店的大楼已落入凯萨手中的事。

desc.en: Due to the inability to pay rent, as well as exposing their location during the fight with the Prefect Team, the Problem Solver has to move their office out of the place. Though saying "Because this is how a badass should be...", Aru is interrupted and commented with "really worries others".
desc.jp: Due to the inability to pay rent, as well as exposing their location during the fight with the Prefect Team, the Problem Solver has to move their office out of the place. Though saying "Because this is how a badass should be...", Aru is interrupted and commented with "really worries others".
desc.zh_cn: 由于交不起房租，加上上次与{cn风纪委员会}的战斗暴露了自己的位置，便利屋一行人不得不搬出自己原有的住宅。{cf亚瑠}表示“因为这才是坏蛋……”却被多人打断，表示{cf亚瑠}真是令人操心。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Sensei meets all the Problem Solver 68 on move and wishes them a happy trip. Aru says it's a pleasant experience to be a cooperation partner and promises they will come back to Abydos for him, and especially for the ramen. The truck loaded with all the stuff disappears at the cross then.
desc.jp: Sensei meets all the Problem Solver 68 on move and wishes them a happy trip. Aru says it's a pleasant experience to be a cooperation partner and promises they will come back to Abydos for him, and especially for the ramen. The truck loaded with all the stuff disappears at the cross then.
desc.zh_cn: 老师遇到了搬家的便利屋全体成员们，祝他们一路顺风。{cf亚瑠}表示与老师成为合作伙伴很高兴，且今后一定也会回{sn阿拜多斯}看看，尤其是会回来吃美味的拉面。装着{cn便利屋68}东西的卡车随后消失在路口。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Ayane and Serika visits Master Shiba and expresses their pity on the destruction of the ramen shop. But unexpectedly, Master Shiba says that he has already received a notice to close down the store, which makes the two very surprised. Master Shiba explains that due to the inability to pay the debts, the lands of Abydos are not belong to the school and are bought by Kaiser. Master Shiba also mentions that there is a big bag of money in front of the store, and Sensei suggests that they might be used as a reconstruction fund.
desc.jp: Ayane and Serika visits Master Shiba and expresses their pity on the destruction of the ramen shop. But unexpectedly, Master Shiba says that he has already received a notice to close down the store, which makes the two very surprised. Master Shiba explains that due to the inability to pay the debts, the lands of Abydos are not belong to the school and are bought by Kaiser. Master Shiba also mentions that there is a big bag of money in front of the store, and Sensei suggests that they might be used as a reconstruction fund.
desc.zh_cn: {cf绫音}和{cf茜香}前来看望柴大将，表示拉面店被毁掉了实属可惜。但意外的是，柴大将表示本来就收到了关店通知，这让两人感到非常诧异。大将表示，前些年由于债款无法还上，{sn阿拜多斯}土地所有权实际已经不属于学校，贷款给了凯撒公司。大将还提到了店门口有一个大袋子装着钱，老师则提议不妨将它们作为重建资金。

desc.en: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.
desc.jp: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.
desc.zh_cn: 把气愤的学妹们送回家后，{cf星野}把身穿黑西装的男人曾向自己提出秘密交易的事告诉老师。虽然老师替{cf星野}打气加油，但隔天{cf星野}却留下自动退学书消失踪影。

desc.en: Hoshino remembers the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.jp: Hoshino remembers the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}记起了和以前那位学生会会长的事情。那位会长对{cf未来}的一切充满希望，认定{sn阿拜多斯}的{cf未来}并非如此，还将以前庆典的一张海报给了{cf星野}。但{cf星野}打断并否定了她，还撕烂了手中的海报。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.jp: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 梦是阿拜多斯前学生会的主席。她曾与星野一起工作，对未来抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一张与星野一起拍的合照上出现过。当前没有更多关于她的消息，但有些人认为她可能已经死了，如在第一篇和最终篇中所呈现的一样。

Shiroko says she wanted to investigate it first, but gets caught by Ayane to be having the previous idea. Hoshino advises everyone to calm down and return to take rests first.
desc.jp: Everyone still can't understand what PMC is looking for; after all, high value stuff like oils has long been proved to be non-existed. Shiroko says she wanted to investigate it first, but gets caught by Ayane to be having the previous idea. Hoshino advises everyone to calm down and return to take rests first.
desc.zh_cn: 众人还是不理解PMC究竟在找什么，毕竟石油之类的高价值物品已被探明并不存在。{cf白子}想先去调查一下，但被{cf绫音}识出可能实为去抢银行，遭到阻止。{cf星野}让大家冷静下来，先行回去休息。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Shiroko and Sensei waits into the night. Hoshino sends Shiroko away for "being too tired". Sensei remains in the classroom and takes out Hoshino's resignation application. Hoshino tries to move the problem onto Shiroko, but Sensei didn't let go. Hoshino agrees to talk about the situation, but first she would like to be out at the corridors.
desc.jp: Shiroko and Sensei waits into the night. Hoshino sends Shiroko away for "being too tired". Sensei remains in the classroom and takes out Hoshino's resignation application. Hoshino tries to move the problem onto Shiroko, but Sensei didn't let go. Hoshino agrees to talk about the situation, but first she would like to be out at the corridors.
desc.zh_cn: {cf白子}和老师等到很晚才离开。{cf星野}因疲劳打发走了{cf白子}，但老师并未离开。老师拿出了{cf星野}的退社信，{cf星野}想把问题转移到{cf白子}上，但老师紧追不放。{cf星野}同意向老师讲述情况，但得出去到走廊上。

desc.en: The sandstorm brings much dust into the school corridors. Hoshino coughs a few times and apologizes for the lack of manpower. Hoshino then mutters a few words. Sensei says that Hoshino seems to be really liking Abydos, but gets denied by the latter. Then, Hoshino tells Sensei about the "deal".
desc.jp: The sandstorm brings much dust into the school corridors. Hoshino coughs a few times and apologizes for the lack of manpower. Hoshino then mutters a few words. Sensei says that Hoshino seems to be really liking Abydos, but gets denied by the latter. Then, Hoshino tells Sensei about the "deal".
desc.zh_cn: 因为风沙太大，积尘严重，{cf星野}咳了几声，表示学校人手实在不够。{cf星野}之后又嘀咕了几句。老师说{cf星野}看上去非常喜欢{sn阿拜多斯}，后者则表示了否定。之后，{cf星野}向老师讲出了那个“请求”。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Hoshino suspects that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seems to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino says that she has never seen anyone like him in Kivotos, and it appears to her that even Kaiser Director fears him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino says it is nothing serious and rips it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino says she'll made it clear for everyone, but also feels that it is the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei makes a promise to Hoshino that he will eventually come up with solutions.
desc.jp: Hoshino suspects that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seems to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino says that she has never seen anyone like him in Kivotos, and it appears to her that even Kaiser Director fears him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino says it is nothing serious and rips it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino says she'll made it clear for everyone, but also feels that it is the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei makes a promise to Hoshino that he will eventually come up with solutions.
desc.zh_cn: {cf星野}推测PMC（尤其是黑服）似乎是在招募一些能手。{cf星野}表示她从没在基沃托斯见过他那样的人，而且似乎凯撒集团的理事也很怕他。至于退社信，{cf星野}表示只是脑袋一时糊涂，在老师面前撕掉了它。{cf星野}还表示明天会和大家说清楚，但又觉得接受那个请求似乎唯一无二。{cf星野}走前，老师承诺会想出解决方案。

desc.en: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.jp: Aris meets with Millennium students who cheer her on, and discusses the Sword of Light with members of the Engineering Department. She enjoys every moment of it. Afterwards, Aris runs into Neru and they visit an arcade to enjoy some video games together. Though they were once enemies against each other, Aris is now proud to declare Neru as her party member.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}和{sn千年}的学生们见面后，学生们给予了加油，和{cn工程师部}见面后则聊了「光之剑」，度过了愉快的时光。后来{cf爱丽丝}遇见{cf宁瑠}，两人一起去游戏中心开心地玩游戏。虽然两人曾经是兵戎相见的关系，但现在{cf爱丽丝}也能笑着说{cf宁瑠}是自己的同伴。

desc.en: Aris met other Millennium students at the school square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. Aris was even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.jp: Aris met other Millennium students at the school square and she was welcomed and greeted with great delight. Aris was even given some "side quests" and received some snacks as the "mission" reward.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}在{sn千年}广场遇到了{sn其他}{sn千年}的学生，大家都很高兴见到她。中途{cf爱丽丝}还收到了几个支线任务，被以报酬的名义赠送了点心。

desc.en: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.jp: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第四首曲子，节奏欢快明亮，在各种故事剧情中都很常出现。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aris met the three of the Engineering Department. The three said they were out seeking for some new equipments. Utaha asked the conditions of the Sword of Light, Aris said that it was kept with her utmost care.

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.jp: Being called "little" angered Neru, but still she dragged Aris and Sensei to an arcade store. As expected, Aris defeated Neru. Though Aris had already been teaching her for quite a while, Neru was still pretty frustrated when hearing that Aris said she was playng bad. Despite all of this, she asked Aris to teach her combos.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}叫{cf宁瑠}“小不点”让后者颇为不满，但还是拽着老师和{cf爱丽丝}到了游戏厅。不出所料，{cf宁瑠}不断输给了{cf爱丽丝}，尽管{cf爱丽丝}已经教了她相当一段时间。{cf宁瑠}虽然非常恼火{cf爱丽丝}评价她的水平不好，但还是请教{cf爱丽丝}连招的操作。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Sensei was surprised to see that Aris wasn't afraid of Neru. Sensei was glad to get to know Aris' daily life. Though didn't complete Yuzu's assignment, Aris still felt happy. And she said that a hero will not give up easily.
desc.jp: Sensei was surprised to see that Aris wasn't afraid of Neru. Sensei was glad to get to know Aris' daily life. Though didn't complete Yuzu's assignment, Aris still felt happy. And she said that a hero will not give up easily.
desc.zh_cn: 老师对{cf爱丽丝}居然不害怕{cf宁瑠}感到惊讶，而{cf爱丽丝}则表示是因为{cf宁瑠}现在已经是个伙伴了。老师对能了解{cf爱丽丝}的生活感到开心。虽然没能完成{cf柚子}布置的任务，但{cf爱丽丝}还是很开心，并且表示勇者是不会轻易放弃的。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。

desc.en: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.jp: While tending to an unconscious Momoi, Sensei is contacted by Midori and heads to the Game Development Department where Aris has shut herself in. In spite of Sensei's placating words, Aris reproaches herself for putting Momoi in danger. At that moment, an unexpected visitor arrives with an unsettling revelation.
desc.zh_cn: 老师原本在照顾失去意识的{cf桃井}，接获{cf绿}的联系后，便去找窝在{cn游戏开发部}的{cf爱丽丝}。尽管老师给予了安慰，但{cf爱丽丝}依旧因为自己伤害了{cf桃井}而很自责。就在那个时候，出乎预料的人物现身告知了「真相」。

desc.en: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris shrouded over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the infos provided by everyone.
desc.jp: In the midst of the battle against Aris, Momoi fell. Though she was sent to Schale's infirmary in time, Momoi remained unconscious even after a few days. The mystery of Aris shrouded over everyone's head, and Sensei started recalling all the infos provided by everyone.
desc.zh_cn: 在与{cf爱丽丝}的混战中，{cf桃井}不幸倒地。虽然及时送到了{et夏莱}的医务室，但几天后仍未苏醒。关于{cf爱丽丝}的谜团如阴云般笼罩着每个人的心头，老师开始回忆起所有人提供的信息与线索。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: Yuzu and Midori requested help from Sensei for the fact that Aris locked herself up in the club room all day long. Sensei called once softly outside the club room, and walked in despite no response.
desc.jp: Yuzu and Midori requested help from Sensei for the fact that Aris locked herself up in the club room all day long. Sensei called once softly outside the club room, and walked in despite no response.
desc.zh_cn: {cf柚子}和{cf绿}向老师请求协助，{cf爱丽丝}一直待在{cn游戏开发部}的活动室里不肯出来。老师轻轻喊了一声，见没回应便走了进去。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
ミレニアムサイエンススクール

realname.zh_cn: 机械迷林(High-Tech Full On Mix)

desc.en: Aris blamed herself for the harm she had done to everyone, especially Momoi. Aris said that she didn't know what happened, but her body responded automatically, as if a hidden game save file was loaded and activated.
desc.jp: Aris blamed herself for the harm she had done to everyone, especially Momoi. Aris said that she didn't know what happened, but her body responded automatically, as if a hidden game save file was loaded and activated.
desc.zh_cn: {cf爱丽丝}对自己给众人，尤其是{cf桃井}的伤害自责不已。{cf爱丽丝}表示自己也不清楚发生了什么，但身体却自动做出了反应，如同隐藏的存档被激活一般。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: When Aris was having great trouble speaking, Rio suddenly broke into the room. She claimed that she would tell everyone the true behind all of these.
desc.jp: When Aris was having great trouble speaking, Rio suddenly broke into the room. She claimed that she would tell everyone the true behind all of these.
desc.zh_cn: 就在{cf爱丽丝}讲不下去话的时候，{cf莉音}突然闯了进来。她声称将要为所有人道出这一切的真相。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: Sensei tries to convince Shun to take the antidote, but she complains about her responsibilities as an instructor. She admits to being worried about the children before hearing Kokona and the other students' voices. Shun then takes the antidote.
desc.jp: Sensei tries to convince Shun to take the antidote, but she complains about her responsibilities as an instructor. She admits to being worried about the children before hearing Kokona and the other students' voices. Shun then takes the antidote.
desc.zh_cn: 老师为今天无法履行约定而向{cf沙耶}道歉，并决定再次与{cf旬}对话。交谈时，从{cf旬}的口中流露出身为教官所肩负的重任。{cf旬}说今天很放松，但她心中也有各种矛盾。这时，从远处传来了幼儿园孩子们的声音……

desc.en: Shun, an instructor of the Plum Blossom Garden, drinks Saya's rejuvenation elixir and accidentally reverts back to her young self. However, she now has the body and demeanor of a child. Now she's causing all kinds of mischief...
desc.jp: Shun, an instructor of the Plum Blossom Garden, drinks Saya's rejuvenation elixir and accidentally reverts back to her young self. However, she now has the body and demeanor of a child. Now she's causing all kinds of mischief...

desc.en: Wakamo arrives as reinforcement for Rabu but is embarrassed by Sensei's presence and runs away. Sensei predicts that with Wakamo's involvement, the future will be bumpy.

desc.zh_cn: 接受良舞的要求作为支持部队的{cf若藻}，因为老师也在而陷入混乱无法战斗，与头盔团一同逃走了。另一方面，{cf白子}因为钓鱼道具在战斗中受到破坏而非常失落。

desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}渡假胜地复原{cn对策委员会}

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn:
{cn对策委员会}一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？

desc.zh_cn:
{cn对策委员会}一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？

desc.en: Shizuko and the others succeed in discovering the hot springs first thanks to Chise's efforts, and the Hot Springs Department members clearly admit defeat. However, Shizuko opts to sign a franchise contract with the Hot Springs Department and promises to maintain a cooperative relationship.
desc.jp: Shizuko and the others succeed in discovering the hot springs first thanks to Chise's efforts, and the Hot Springs Department members clearly admit defeat. However, Shizuko opts to sign a franchise contract with the Hot Springs Department and promises to maintain a cooperative relationship.
desc.zh_cn: {cf静子}们，因{cf知世}的活跃成功发现了温泉。认输的{cn温泉开发部}，虽然将契约书交出……反而，{cf静子}提出了新的契约询问是否要和百夜堂缔结加盟契约进而营运温泉渡假胜地。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Noa and Sensei pay a visit to Veritas, Millennium Science School's hacker group. Though the members of Veritas initially regard Noa's visit with suspicion, Noa's heartfelt request wins them over and they agree to help with the festival. Meanwhile, Chihiro finds out that someone has attempted to hack into Millennium's servers.
desc.jp: Noa and Sensei pay a visit to Veritas, Millennium Science School's hacker group. Though the members of Veritas initially regard Noa's visit with suspicion, Noa's heartfelt request wins them over and they agree to help with the festival. desc.zh_cn: {cf乃爱}和老师前往{sn千年}学园的黑客集团「{cn贝里塔斯}」。在{cf乃爱}的真诚的请求下，起初对{cf乃爱}的来访感到警戒的{cn贝里塔斯}也决定敞开心房帮助他。另一方面，{cf千寻}得知了有人尝试入侵{sn千年}学园的服务器。

desc.en: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.jp: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯运动大会「晄轮大祭」终于开始了。各个学园齐聚一堂，在相互竞争的庆典背后，暗藏着波涛汹涌……究竟，胜利女神会向哪个学园露出微笑呢？

desc.en: The Kivotos Halo Festival has finally begun! Every participant is giving their all to make their school proud. But with trouble brewing as usual, who will be the one to claim victory?

desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯运动大会「晄轮大祭」终于开始了。各个学园齐聚一堂，在相互竞争的庆典背后，暗藏着波涛汹涌……究竟，胜利女神会向哪个学园露出微笑呢？

desc.en: Nyaomoto Kan, the president of the Nyao Foods chain of restaurants, contemplates how to deal with Sparrow. Meanwhile, the Sparrow's Restaurateur is scared to fight such a large corporation. Faced with an ongoing series of misfortunes, they want to give up. But Juri persuades them to keep trying.
desc.jp: Nyaomoto Kan, the president of the Nyao Foods chain of restaurants, contemplates how to deal with Sparrow. Meanwhile, the Sparrow's Restaurateur is scared to fight such a large corporation. Faced with an ongoing series of misfortunes, they want to give up. But Juri persuades them to keep trying.
desc.zh_cn: 连锁公司喵食品公司的会长喵．元宽在苦思麻雀亭的待遇问题。另一方面，经过一连串的骚动，麻雀亭的老板娘因害怕对抗大企业，一度想要放弃。但{cf茱莉}说服老板娘绝对不能放弃。

name.zh_cn: 正餐前的开胃年菜～一局定输赢～

desc.en: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.jp: The Gourmet Research Society discovers that Sparrow will be closing soon! To save the restaurant, they need to get help from the School Lunch Club. The School Lunch Club agrees to help--but only if the Gourmet Research Society can resolve an issue with Nyao Foods, a large distributor...
desc.zh_cn: 年关将近，久违发现令人满足的名店「麻雀亭」的{cn美食研究会}，得知了该店正面临关门的危机……破天荒的{cn美食研究会}与{cf风华}交织而成的店铺重建闹剧──正式开幕！

desc.en: The unexpected allies turn out to be C&C members. The group fears that Neru will scold them, but she instead praises them for doing a good job. At the same time, Akira is lost in her own thoughts as she recalls Sensei's words.

desc.zh_cn: 意想不到的帮手就是{cnC&C}的成员们。一行人虽然害怕被{cf宁瑠}斥责，但{cf宁瑠}反而称赞一行人表现得很好。同一时间，晶回想老师说过的话，独自沉浸在感伤当中。

desc.en: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?
desc.jp: Mistaken for C&C, the Game Development Department is hired to guard an old mansion. The request is to protect the artwork from Thugs. Will they be able to protect the art from the Thugs?

desc.en: Rin harshly points out the mistakes in Sensei's reports. Rin brings out the snacks she had been keeping in the reception room when she learns that the shoddy reports were caused by Sensei's lack of sleep.
desc.jp: Rin harshly points out the mistakes in Sensei's reports. Rin brings out the snacks she had been keeping in the reception room when she learns that the shoddy reports were caused by Sensei's lack of sleep.
desc.zh_cn: {cf琳}严肃地指出老师缴交的报告中的错误及缺漏，然而，当{cf琳}得知报告的内容之所以漏洞百出，是因为老师长时间睡眠不足的关系时，她便贴心地将招待室内存放的点心递到老师面前。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Mashiro comes across some emergency ration chocolate while clearing out storage supplies. It doesn't have much taste, but Mashiro praises the chocolate for it's effectiveness as an emergency food supply.

desc.en: Sensei receives chocolate from Hina during a secret meeting with her on Valentine's Day. Hina apologizes for giving chocolate that looks as ugly as she does, but Sensei is delighted at having received Hina's homemade chocolate, and Hina feels relieved.
desc.jp: Sensei receives chocolate from Hina during a secret meeting with her on Valentine's Day. Hina apologizes for giving chocolate that looks as ugly as she does, but Sensei is delighted at having received Hina's homemade chocolate, and Hina feels relieved.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳奈}和老师在情人节当天私下见了一面，而{cf阳奈}也趁这个机会把自己准备的巧克力送给老师。因为觉得那些巧克力长得跟自己一样丑，{cf阳奈}还特地向老师道歉，没想到老师却依旧开心地收下她做的手工巧克力，让{cf阳奈}彻底松了一口气。

desc.en: Juri gives Sensei some chocolate. Sensei realizes that she couldn't have made them herself because of their ordinary taste. Juri is delighted to hear that they'd like to taste her homemade chocolates. Sensei passes out without regret upon tasting them.
desc.jp: Juri gives Sensei some chocolate. Sensei realizes that she couldn't have made them herself because of their ordinary taste. Juri is delighted to hear that they'd like to taste her homemade chocolates. Sensei passes out without regret upon tasting them.
desc.zh_cn: 由于味道相当普通，因此老师很快便意识到{cf茱莉}宣称的手工巧克力，其实并不是她亲手做的。在老师的要求之下，{cf茱莉}兴高采烈地拿出她做的正版手工巧克力，而老师在如愿品尝到{cf茱莉}的特制巧克力后，也终于安心地昏死过去。

desc.en: Serika and Sensei spend a hectic day doing part-time work at a dessert shop. It turns out that the purpose of Serika working part-time there was so she could get their signature cake. The two of them share the cake together as they decompress from their day.

desc.en: Momoi participates in a gaming competition on Valentine's Day, but is immediately eliminated. Though her plans to give her winning trophy along with some chocolate as gifts to Sensei are ruined, Momoi gets some chocolate from a claw machine to give Sensei instead.
desc.jp: Momoi participates in a gaming competition on Valentine's Day, but is immediately eliminated. Though her plans to give her winning trophy along with some chocolate as gifts to Sensei are ruined, Momoi gets some chocolate from a claw machine to give Sensei instead.
desc.zh_cn: {cf桃井}信誓旦旦地参加了一场情人节游戏大赛，然而没想到她却在第一场比赛就惨遭淘汰。虽然没能按照原定计划，将优胜奖杯和巧克力一起送给老师，但{cf桃井}最后还是把自己在抽饼干游戏中获得的巧克力送给了老师。

desc.jp: Chise house-sits at the Yin-Yang Club room, peeling the wrapping paper off something next to Sensei as they work. It turns out the wrapping paper contains chocolate four-character senbei. She shares the chocolate with the idiom with Sensei after finding the idiom she was looking for.

desc.jp: Azusa summons Sensei to a gloomy area at the foot of a mountain. She gifts Sensei with chocolate in the shape of Skullman but is surprised when Sensei gobbles it up without much thought. However, upon hearing Sensei's unexpected words, Azusa finally breaks out into a smile.

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。
